<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Redirect callback URL webhook"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"event"}
  path={"webhook"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



We send a webhook for every request made to the Receiver's Redirect Callback URL endpoints. 
When the request status is ERROR, there will be an errorCode and an errorDescription, which can be:
    

| Error Code | Error Description |
|----------|:-------------|
|PBE1800|Redirect Url Not Found|
|PBE1801|Invalid Redirect Url|
|PBE1802|Callback Redirect URL not registered|
|PBE1803|Callback Redirect URL already registered|
|PBE1804|Callback Redirect URL is not CONFIRMED|

You can sign this webhook in the logged area of this portal or via [API](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook), with the entity ```ObkClientRedirectUrl```. You can also configure the security validation method for the requests, which can be either ```mTLS Certificate``` or ```Hash Signature (HMAC SHA256 Hash)```.

For more information on the security validation methods, check the ```AUTHORIZATIONS``` section below.

For more information on webhooks, see the [Webhook Documentation](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}

</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

This value can't be repeated.","type":"string","title":"ClientRequestId"},"createTimestamp":{"description":"Entity's creation timestamp.","type":"string","title":"CreateTimestamp"},"lastUpdateTimestamp":{"description":"Entity's last update timestamp.","type":"string","title":"LastUpdateTimestamp"},"entity":{"description":"Entity's name.","type":"string","title":"Entity"},"status":{"description":"The state of the receiver payment initiation redirect callback url, which at the time of its creation will be ENQUEUED.\n","enum":["ENQUEUED","ERROR","CONFIRMED"],"type":"string","title":"ReceiverPaymentInitiationRedirectCallbackUrlStatus"},"body":{"required":["redirectUrl","description"],"type":"object","properties":{"redirectUrl":{"pattern":"^(https:\\/\\/)((?!#).)*$","type":"string","description":"The Redirect URL that will be registered on the Software Statement and used to make the callback of the Payment Initiations"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"A description of the url, can be the name of it or an short description to identify it for you"}},"title":"ReceiverPaymentInitiationRedirectCallbackUrlBody"},"tags":{"description":"Tags that can be sent by the client, it will be saved on the Entity, use as a metadata field","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["tag1","tag2"],"title":"Tags"},"errorCode":{"description":"The code for the error. This is only present if the status of the request is ERROR","type":"string"},"errorDescription":{"description":"The code for the error.
